testcase.name: useAuth Hook > financial role scenarios > should restrict sensitive operations appropriately
Financial Calculations > precision and rounding > should handle currency precision correctly
Financial Calculations > precision and rounding > should maintain precision across multiple calculations
Financial Calculations > precision and rounding > should handle edge cases in financial calculations
Financial Calculations > tax calculations > should calculate tax correctly for various rates
Financial Calculations > tax calculations > should handle compound tax calculations
Financial Calculations > tax calculations > should handle tax-inclusive pricing
Financial Calculations > discount calculations > should calculate percentage discounts correctly
Financial Calculations > discount calculations > should calculate fixed amount discounts correctly
Financial Calculations > payment calculations > should calculate payment allocations correctly
Financial Calculations > payment calculations > should handle overpayment scenarios
Financial Calculations > payment calculations > should calculate payment processing fees
Financial Calculations > currency conversion > should handle currency conversion with proper rounding
Financial Calculations > currency conversion > should maintain precision in conversion chains
Financial Calculations > interest and penalty calculations > should calculate late payment penalties
Financial Calculations > interest and penalty calculations > should calculate compound interest
Financial Calculations > recurring billing calculations > should calculate prorated amounts for partial periods
Financial Calculations > recurring billing calculations > should handle leap year prorating
Financial Calculations > financial reporting calculations > should calculate accurate profit margins
Financial Calculations > financial reporting calculations > should handle zero-division scenarios in ratio calculations
Auth Store > initial state > should have correct initial state
Auth Store > login > should login successfully with valid credentials
